starters.name: Truffle Mushroom Soup
starters.description: A rich and creamy soup infused with truffle oil, served with crispy sourdough.

starters.name: Crispy Calamari
starters.description: Golden-fried calamari rings served with a zesty garlic aioli.

starters.name: Bruschetta Trio
starters.description: A selection of tomato-basil, smoked salmon, and truffle mushroom bruschetta on toasted baguette.

starters.name: Goat Cheese & Beetroot Salad
starters.description: Fresh arugula, roasted beetroot, and creamy goat cheese with a balsamic glaze.

starters.name: Garlic Butter Prawns
starters.description: Succulent prawns sautéed in garlic butter and white wine, served with fresh herbs.

mains.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
mains.description: Fresh salmon fillet with lemon butter sauce, served with asparagus and mashed potatoes.

mains.name: Truffle Mushroom Risotto
mains.description: Creamy Arborio rice infused with truffle oil, parmesan, and wild mushrooms.

mains.name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
mains.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to perfection, served with rosemary fries and peppercorn sauce.

mains.name: Pistachio-Crusted Chicken
mains.description: Tender chicken breast coated in crushed pistachios, served with roasted vegetables.

mains.name: Lobster Tagliatelle
mains.description: Homemade tagliatelle pasta with fresh lobster, cherry tomatoes, and a white wine sauce.

mains.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
mains.description: A nourishing bowl of quinoa, avocado, chickpeas, roasted sweet potatoes, and tahini dressing.

mains.name: Duck Confit
mains.description: Slow-cooked duck leg with crispy skin, served with red cabbage and potato gratin.

desserts.name: Dark Chocolate Fondant
desserts.description: Rich molten chocolate cake with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream.

desserts.name: Lemon Tart
desserts.description: Tangy lemon tart with a buttery crust, served with fresh berries.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

desserts.name: Pistachio Panna Cotta
desserts.description: Silky smooth panna cotta infused with pistachios, topped with honey drizzle.

desserts.name: Caramelized Banana Crepes
desserts.description: Delicate crepes filled with caramelized bananas and drizzled with maple syrup.
